headline: Assessing W. R. Berkley’s valuation after its latest 1 per share special dividend announcement
summary: W. R. Berkley (WRB) just caught investors’ attention with a fresh 1 dollar per share special dividend, capping 2025 special payouts at 1.50 dollars and underscoring management confidence in the insurer’s cash generation. See our latest analysis for W. R. Berkley. The new special dividend lands as W. R. Berkley’s share price hovers around 69.33 dollars after a choppy few months. A solid year to date share price return and strong multi year total shareholder returns suggest momentum is cooling,...
